data.text: Mweye iwatawala, vino molonga kwa haki?
Wanhu wehile wainega tangu kuleligwa kwao.
Sumu yao kamba sumu ya zoka,
ayo hohulika sauti ya mganga yolagula,
Gweye Imulungu ibene imizino mmilomo yao,
Waleke wasegele kamba mazi gokilima himahima,
Nongo zenu hazinapata moto kwa ngodi za miba,
Wene haki odeng'helela wahawona wehile obwezelwa,
Avo iwanhu olonga, â€œWene haki wana nhunza,
